main event: Observer saw what appears to be an aerial explosion 40 miles west of Burns Junction, Nevada
interesting points: The observer reported the sighting to the radar site at Winnemucca, Nevada.
The Air Defense Sector at Reno, Nevada was contacted for additional information, but no further details were provided.
Local radio news broadcasts reported pieces of a meteor falling in Oregon the previous night, and it was believed the sighting may have been of a meteor.
A request was made for an aerial inspection and thorough investigation to be conducted in accordance with Air Force Regulation 200-2.
No conclusion could be drawn from the limited data provided in the report.
location: 40 miles west of Burns Junction, Nevada
